title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: I just got on this morning to play League, but when I click on the icon the box showing PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working always shows up when I'm trying to boot League. Is anyone else getting the problem?

replies.body: Yes this just recently started happening to me but you are able to run it if you right click the icon and run the application as an administrator. However not only this but now when I try to get into a game champ select and everything is fine but loading in it freezes my whole computer only fixable by turning it off and on again. Even doing that if I try to reconnect it freezes again and both these things started happening at the same time. I'm done with league honestly because it's them, not my computer.

Did you recently update Windows 10?  There's been an issue with the Xbox game bar causing freezes like this.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if that helps!

The patcher needs permission to launch and scan game files, otherwise it can result in an error like the one you're seeing.  Go over each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
